meanings.definition: A button on a keyboard that is pressed to input a specific character or command.
meanings.sent1: I pressed the keybuttons to type the letter 'A'.
meanings.sent2: The keybuttons on my keyboard are getting worn out from constant use.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked across the keyboard and accidentally pressed several keybuttons.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the keybuttons like a skilled pianist.
meanings.sent5: The keybuttons glowed softly in the dimly lit room, inviting me to type.

meanings.definition: The main or most important buttons on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to clean the keybuttons regularly to keep your keyboard in good condition.
meanings.sent2: The keybuttons for volume control are located at the top of the keyboard.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly referred to the power button as the 'king of keybuttons'.
meanings.sent4: The keybuttons of knowledge unlocked a world of information at his fingertips.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle touch, she pressed the keybuttons with precision and accuracy.
